about_the_game:
This game is a high-difficulty Metroidvania game. Explore the magnificent BGM, matching background, and wide map. The game does not have a separate start screen or tutorial. Explore the beautiful world by using invincible rolling techniques and acquire other skills!

Beat the high level bosses and explore the world with finding hidden treasures!

Here is the key description:

Shift: roll

Z: Jump (double jump)

X: Normal attack

C: dash

Q,E: Skill Swap

Tab: Display acquired items

M: Show minimap

ESC: Menu

Left and right arrows: player control

short_description: The story of Little Red Riding Hood begins in the forest with her companion Light in an unfamiliar place with no memory. Enjoy a full-scale side-scrolling action RPG with tough boss battles where even a moment of inattention can kill you, and uncover the truth about the lost world.
